module.name: ACR
module.description: Scripting and programming with the ACR

helpLink.tooltipText: Defintion of the Astronomy Client Runtime (ACR), how to connect to it, and the operations it provides
API documentation - lists available methods, gives examples of their use

link.tooltipText: Call ACR from java using JavaRMI

link.toolTipText: A collection of scripts that call VO Services through the ACR - useful in their own right and as examples
Perl scripts that show how to connect to ACR
